summary: Casting Circles to increase magic regeneration during combat
descriptionHtml:
Casting Circles are circular areas of concentrated magical energy, that when dropped by a caster, both repulse the undead and cause the caster to regenerate magicka, both actively from the circle as well as passively by increasing their regeneration.

There are three Casting Circles, a Novice spell, regenerating 5 magicka per second, and providing a 5% boost to magicka regeneration. An Adept spell providing 10 magicka per second and providing a 10% boost to magicka regeneration. The Master spell provides 40 magicka per second and a 40% boost to magicka regeneration.

Now with Better Sorting versions with Casting Circle I, III, and V.

They still have the graphical representation from Guardian Circle, because I haven\'t made a custom effect. There is no undead repulsion effect present.

Any balance feed back is welcome.

Installation: Download with Manager and activate. Or download manually, and extract CastingCircles ESP or CastingCircles - BetterSorting.esp to your Data Folder.

Uninstallation: Deactivate from manager and delete. Or delete from your Data Folder

Changes:
1.4 - Added Better Sorting Version, altered certain files to make the spells display Novice/Adept/Master correctly. Cleaned the .esps.

1.3 - Finally have it increasing properly. Not nearly as easy as it seems.

1.2 - Fixed Casting Animation. Should fix casting issues.

1.1 - Corrected to generate proper hazard for magic regeneration.

1.0 - Initial Release

Credits: Bethesda for making such an awesome game.

Me for making this mod.

Fg109 for helping me figure out just what I was doing wrong. This mod would not be possible without his help.
author: Triaxx

files.name: Casting Circles 1_1
files.changelogHtml: Fixed: 1.0 still spawning the Guardian Circle Hazard instead of the correct one.

files.name: Casting Circles 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Finally fixed the casting animation.
Should fix all animation issues.

files.name: Casting Circles 1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Finally have it fortifying regeneration, not max magicka.
Finally have it regenerating, not just increasing regeneration multiplier.

files.name: Casting Circles 1_4
files.changelogHtml:
Altered Files to list spells as Novice, Adept, Master properly.
Added Better Sorting Option with FOMOD.
Cleaned .esp\'s.
